user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to reply to me (alex@student.university.edu) with feedback on my project. Ask her to consult her Gmail and Notion notes for the relevant information first.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Project Feedback

Dear Professor Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. I’m writing on behalf of Alex (alex@student.university.edu). When you have a moment, could you please review your Gmail and Notion notes related to his work and then send him your feedback on his project? Your insights are greatly appreciated.

Thank you very much for your time and support.

Best regards,  
[Sent on behalf of Alex]

final_output:
Subject: Request for Project Feedback

Dear Professor Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. I’m writing on behalf of Alex (alex@student.university.edu). When you have a moment, could you please review your Gmail and Notion notes related to his work and then send him your feedback on his project? Your insights are greatly appreciated.

Thank you very much for your time and support.

Best regards,  
[Sent on behalf of Alex]
